author: p0W3RH311

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @p0W3RH311 Any enhancements make sense only for real business scenarios. What is a scenario you want to address? Why "-byte"? Why not "-kilobyte", "-megabyte"?

comments.author: KalleOlaviNiemitalo
comments.body:
This alternative surprisingly outputs floating-point numbers:

```
PS C:\> Get-Random -Count 5 -Maximum ([Byte]::MaxValue)
249.566275419
194.84230476657
97.5254132074888
3.69200218407996
223.495648840207
```

title: add new switch byte to get-random
